ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to a trainee nun who had not been given permission by her parents and her husband.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.4_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to that trainee nun without our permission?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.5_0: The nuns heard the complaints of the parents and the husband.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.7_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to a trainee nun who has not been given permission by her parents and her husband?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.11_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.13_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun who has not been given permission by her parents or her husband, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.6_0: the biological parents is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.9_0: Who has not been given permission:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.12_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.15_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.16_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.17_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.18_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1.19_0: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.2.2_0: if she gives her the full admission without knowing that she is a criminal;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.2.3_0: if she gives her the full admission after getting permission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.2.6_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
